title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.6 - Payment of toll required
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 604.6 - Payment of toll required

State Regulations

All vehicles which shall cross the bridge shall pay the toll
as prescribed by Part 602 of this Chapter, at the regularly established places
or booths from the collection of such tolls. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
604.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
